Package edu.aau.g404.api.hue

Class HueLight

java.lang.Object
edu.aau.g404.api.hue.HueLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
SmartLight, SmartDevice
public final class HueLight extends Object implements SmartLight
Represenst a HueLight object that implements the SmartLight interface.

    • rgbToXY

      protected double[] rgbToXY(int r, int g, int b)
      Converts RGB color values to the CIE 1931 color space (xy) values. This method uses the sRGB D65 color space matrix for conversion.
      Parameters:
      r - The red component of the RGB color.
      g - The green component of the RGB color.
      b - The blue component of the RGB color.
      Returns:
      A double array containing the CIE 1931 color space (xy) values.
      See Also:
      • JS implementation
      • RGB to XYZ Matrices
      • XYZ to XY

    • toLinearRGB

      protected double toLinearRGB(int color)
      Converts a single RGB color component to its linear RGB representation.
      Parameters:
      color - The color component value (0-255) to be converted.
      Returns:
      The linear RGB representation of the color component.
